1   package com.test.vendor.derby;
2   
3   import com.test.AbstractTestSuite;
4   import org.hibernate.cfg.JdbcSettings;
5   import spring.SpringApp;
6   
7   public abstract class ConcreteDerbySuiteIT extends AbstractTestSuite {
8   
9       public ConcreteDerbySuiteIT() {
10  
11          this.jdbcURL = SpringApp.propsDerby.getProperty(JdbcSettings.JAKARTA_JDBC_URL);
12          this.jdbcUser = SpringApp.propsDerby.getProperty(JdbcSettings.JAKARTA_JDBC_USER);
13          this.jdbcPass = SpringApp.propsDerby.getProperty(JdbcSettings.JAKARTA_JDBC_PASSWORD);
14  
15          this.jsqlDatabaseName = "ADMIN";
16          this.jsqlTableName = "STUDENT";
17          this.jsqlColumnName = "FIRST_NAME";
18          
19          this.jdbcColumnForDatabaseName = "schemaname";
20          this.jdbcColumnForTableName = "tablename";
21          this.jdbcColumnForColumnName = "columnname";
22          
23          this.jdbcQueryForDatabaseNames = "select schemaname from SYS.SYSSCHEMAS";
24          this.jdbcQueryForTableNames = "select tablename from sys.systables t inner join sys.sysschemas s on t.schemaid = s.schemaid where schemaname='"+ this.jsqlDatabaseName +"'";
25          this.jdbcQueryForColumnNames =
26              "select columnname from sys.systables t inner join sys.sysschemas s on t.schemaid = s.schemaid inner join sys.syscolumns c on t.tableid = c.referenceid"
27              + " where schemaname = '"+ this.jsqlDatabaseName +"' and tablename = '"+ this.jsqlTableName +"'"
28              + " and columndatatype || '' not like 'DOUBLE%'"
29              + " and columndatatype || '' not like 'INTEGER%'"
30              + " and columndatatype || '' not like 'DECIMAL%'"
31              + " and columndatatype || '' not like 'BLOB%'";
32          this.jdbcQueryForValues = "select "+ this.jsqlColumnName +" from "+ this.jsqlDatabaseName +"."+ this.jsqlTableName;
33      }
34  }
